div.bibl: The Reform Advocate, Wk. of March 5, 1927, Vol. 73, p.136.

body.p: On March 6, the Michael Reese Hospital will open the Meyer House, a new building for private patients only. The building is located on Lake Park avenue and 29th street. It is four stories high and will accomodate fifty-four patients in single rooms.
Meyer House was donated to the hospital in memory of Max and Sarah F. Meyer, by their sons and daughters.
